description:
My 2024 Complete Guide to VRChat is HERE! :D (With timestamps!) This game is quite overwhelming for beginners, and even experienced ones still struggle to keep up with all the menus and settings that exist… But this video is your comprehensive guide to becoming a pro! Let me know in the comments your own tips or thoughts on VRChat. 

Join my Discord!:
https://discord.gg/phia

PHIA's Socials
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PHIA_bunny 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/phiabunny 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/phiabunny/ 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@phiabunny?
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/phia 

=TIMESTAMPS=
0:00 - Intro
0:27 - Ways to Play
1:06 - Account Types
1:44 - Quick & Main Menus
2:20 - Radial Menu
3:07 - Player Menu (Friending/Block/Mute)
3:33 - Joining & Creating Worlds
5:05 - Friends List (Invites/Request Invites)
5:37 - Social Status
6:22 - Groups
8:03 - Avatars
8:33 - Avatar Performance Ranks*
9:37 - Shield Settings*
11:44 - Advanced Safety Settings*
13:11 - Chatbox
1
title: VRCHAT BEGINNERS GUIDE [2024] - Introduction for New Players!
